categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic repulsorcraft

nodes.text: Armored Airspeeders were improvements upon the Rebel Alliance's Incom Corporation-produced T-47 airspeeders. As their name suggests, one of the primary improvements was thicker armor.
Armored Airspeeders appeared in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its expansion pack, Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds: Clone Campaigns.
